title: Process a Wage Garnishment
description: HR has received a legal order to garnish an employee's wages for child support.

tasks.description: Receive and validate the legal garnishment order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Payroll specialist confirms the order is legally valid.

tasks.description: Enter the garnishment details (e.g., amount, recipient) into the payroll system for the specified employee.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist correctly sets up the recurring deduction in the HRIS.

tasks.description: Send a notification to the employee informing them that the company has received the order and will begin deductions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist sends the required legal notification to the employee.
